name: S.A.D.I.E. (JAM)
description:
Game prototype for the AGBIC Jam (2017). 

====================

Art & Programming:

 charliesan763 (that would be me) 

https://charliesan.deviantart.com/

https://primatedogma.wixsite.com/home/about

Music by BendSound & Sirius Beat

BENSOUND:

https://www.bensound.com/

SIRIUS BEAT:

https://siriusbeat.com/ 

COVER:

Paul Chin

 http://famicase.com/17/softs/025.html

====================

.:CONTROLS:.

  • WASD Keys   ...................  Main Character Movement
  • Arrow Keys  ....................  Second Character Movement
  • H  Key  ..............................  Hack Minigame
  • P  Key  ..............................  Pause

.:INFO:.

  • You can use S.a.d.i.e. as shield to take the bullet hits.
  • You can save anytime in the game.

"CONTINUE" option in the Menu Screen will take you to the "Slot1" Save State.

You can save at any time using the keys 1, 2 and 3 to save in Slot1, Slot2 and Slot3.

You can load at any time using the keys 4, 5 and 6 to load from Slot1, Slot2 and Slot3.

====================

The game is just a short prototype but I have been willing to make a real cyberpunk themed platformer for a while so I will most certainly do.
